attributes.action: Restrict Media Advertising for online bingo and other gambling sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of the current financial climate we believe it is irresponsible of the governing body to allow such bombardment of Advertising for online bingo and other gambling sites. 

Vulnerable people fall prey to the enticement of their "Free Play offers" of which money has to be deposited to obtain.

These companies are gloryfying gambling and temptation for addiction. 

There should be a limit on how many Bingo sites are available, after all you wouldn't allow mutiple gambling establishments to open on the high street. 
People are in enough debt without these sites popping up over night.
